title: Immolate
description: Burns the target for [~50% Spell Power] fire damage each turn for 3 turns.

title: Fireblast
description: Hurls a bolt of fire dealing [~130% Spell Power] fire damage to a single target.

title: Enchant Fire
description: Enchants the target's weapon, adding [~20% Spell Power] fire damage to attacks.

title: Burning Reach
description: Increases the range of all non-melee abilities by 1 hex.

title: Fire Borne
description: Increases Fire Resistance by 15%.

title: Hot Head I
description: Increases all damage by 8%.

title: Burning Ground
description: Ignite an area in flames. Enemies take [~60% Spell Power] fire damage each turn they remain on burning ground.
notes: This damage also occurs upon re-entering the area if the enemy had left it previously.

title: Fire Shield
description: Wreaths the target in flame granting 15% Fire Resistance. Attackers take [~30% Spell Power] fire damage.

title: Fireball
description: Hurls a ball of flame dealing [~110% Spell Power] fire damage to all targets in range.

title: Cauterize
description: Removes all negative statuses from friendly target but inflicts 10% of target's Maximum Health as fire damage.

title: Fire Starter
description: All enemies now start the battle with 2 stacks of Heat.

title: Hot Head II
description: Increases damage by an additional 12%.
notes: This bonus adds to Hot Head I, for a total of 20% increased damage.

title: Rune of Exploding
description: Place a rune on the selected hex. After 1 turn, it detonates dealing [~200% Spell Power] fire damage to all enemies within 1 hex.

title: Aura of Flame
description: Continually deals [~40% Spell Power] fire damage to all enemies within 3 hexes of your character.
notes: If an enemy leaves then re-enters this area, they will take the damage again. Lasts until removed or not enough mana.

title: Haste
description: Target gains an additional action this turn.
notes: Can be cast on summoned creatures, but does not grant them an additional action. This simply adds 1 to how many action points are available for the target, thus it can stack.

title: Detonate
description: Deals [~160% Spell Power] fire damage to all foes within 2 hexes of your character.

title: Kindling
description: Gain an additional action the first turn of battle.
notes: This only occurs once in arena fights.

title: Fuel for the Flames I
description: Increase the mana cost of all skills by 15% and increase the effectiveness of mana using skills by 30%.

title: Lasting Flame
description: Heat lasts 2 additional turns.
notes: Heat lasts 5 turns instead of 3.

title: Fissure
description: Open the earth in a line spawning deadly fissures that deal [~200% Spell Power] fire damage.
notes: The line is 5 hexes long, and 3 hexes wide.

title: Overwhelming Power
description: Increase the damage of your next damaging action by 100%.
notes: This bonus adds to effects like Hot Head 1 and 2, thus it does not double your damage unless it is the only Generic Damage Modifier active. Lasts until used.

title: Meteor
description: Call down a ball of fire to smash your enemies. Deals [~100% Spell Power] fire damage within 2 hexes. Deals [~25% Spell Power] more fire damage for each stack of Heat active on the targets.
notes: Each targets heat stacks only increase the damage for that one target, not all caught within the blast.

title: Flash Fire
description: Reduces the cooldown of all fire skills by 1.
notes: This stacks with other cooldown reductions that are applicable, but no skill can be reduced below a 1 turn cooldown.

title: Fuel for the Flames II
description: Increase the mana cost of all skills by 25% and increase the effectiveness of mana using skills by 50%.
notes: This bonus adds to Fuel for the Flames I, for a total of 40% increased mana costs, and 80% increased effect.

title: Fever
description: 50% of mana costs are now paid in health instead of mana.

title: Fire Storm
description: Hurls fireballs at 3 different targets dealing [~80% Spell Power] fire damage within 2 hexes of each target.

title: Mass Haste
description: All allies gain an additional action this turn.
notes: Similar to Haste, this does not grant summons an additional action. This can also stack in the same way as Haste.

title: Meteor Shower
description: Summon a rain of meteors to bombard enemies within 4 hexes of the target location. Deals [~70% Spell Power] fire damage 3 times.

title: Fickle Flame
description: Each time a damage or healing skill is cast, it receives a random effectiveness modifier from 50% up to 250%.
notes: This overall boosts damage more than it lowers it, as it is more likely to get a value from 100%-250% than from 50%-99%. The value from this does adjust tooltips, but it is randomized after casting, thus can not be manipulated via reading the ability descriptions. Does not apply to Purge Mana, as that is not damage or healing.

title: Avatar of Flame
description: Each stack of Heat now applies [20% Spell Power] fire damage to the target per turn.

title: Enchant Lightning
description: Enchants the target's weapon adding [~20% Spell Power] lightning damage to attacks for 3 turns.

title: Shock
description: Reaches out and shocks the target dealing [~60% Spell Power] lightning damage. Applies Disabled to the target.

title: Dazzling Darts
description: Shoots 3 darts of electricity each dealing [~40% Spell Power] as lightning damage.

title: Storm Weathered I
description: Increases all Elemental Resistances by 5%.

title: Stormbringer I
description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 5%.

title: Thunder Borne
description: Increases Lightning Resistance by 15%.

title: Lightning Shield
description: Increases Elemental Resistance by 20%. Attackers take [~15% Spell Power] lightning damage.

title: Twister
description: Summons a raging tempest that deals [~120% Spell Power] lightning damage in a line. Targets hit are Crippled for 2 turns.
notes: The line is 6 hexes long and 3 hexes wide.

title: Discharge
description: Deals [~90% Spell Power] lightning damage within 3 hexes of the caster.

title: Teleport Self
description: Teleports the caster to the target location in a flash of lightning. Unaffected by increased range modifiers.

title: Storm Weathered II
description: Increases all Elemental Resistances by an additional 10%.
notes: This bonus adds to Storm Weathered 1 for a total of 15% Elemental Resistances.

title: Stormbringer II
description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by an additional 8%.
notes: This bonus adds to Stormbringer 1 for a total of 13% increase to Critical Hit chance.

title: Gathering Storm
description: Increases Maximum Mana by 20%.

title: Aura of Lightning
description: Each time an action is made by an enemy within the 3 hexes they suffer [~40% Spell Power] lightning damage.
notes: Lasts until removed or not enough mana.

title: Teleport Other
description: Teleports the target to the location of your choosing in a flash of lightning. Unaffected by increased range modifiers.

title: Thunder Bolt
description: Summon lightning from the sky to strike an area dealing [~110% Spell Power] lightning damage.

title: Chain Lightning
description: Conjures a lightning bolt that chains up to 5 enemies near the target dealing [~80% Spell Power] lightning damage to each target.

title: Storm Brewing
description: Each stack of Shocked you've applied increases your Critical Hit Chance by 3%.

title: Energy Shield
description: 50% of the damage taken is lost in mana instead of health.

title: Static Field
description: Averages all the current health percentages of targets within 3 hexes and redistributes them to be even.

title: Overload
description: Gives the target 100% Critical Hit Change for 1 turn.

title: Shocking Shackles
description: Deals [100% Spell Power] lightning damage. Applies Stunned.
notes: This ability does not have a damage range, and thus always does the same amount of damage.

title: Thunder Storm
description: Summon a thunderstorm over a large area that deals [90% Spell Power] lightning damage every turn to enemies with it's range.
notes: This ability does not have a damage range, and thus always does the same amount of damage.

title: Heavy Rains
description: Each point of Intelligence now grants 0.1% Critical Hit Chance and 1% Critical Hit Damage.

title: Recharge
description: You have a 33% chance to completely refund the mana cost spent while using abilities. When mana is refunded this way, a random ability will have its cooldown lowered by 1.

title: Energy Cannon
description: Deals [~20% Spell Power] lightning damage in a 6 hex line 10 times.
notes: The line is 6 hexes long and 3 hexes wide.

title: Thunder Wrath
description: Summons 4 thunder bolts targeting enemies at random within a 10 hex radius. Each bolt deals [100% Spell Power] lightning damage to foes within 3 hexes of its blast.
notes: This ability has no damage range and thus always does the same damage.

title: Conduit
description: Gains an additional action each turn.

title: Thunder Struck
description: Your lightning damage has a 20% chance to conjure a thunderbolt on a random enemy dealing [110% Spell Power] lightning damage within 2 hexes of its blast.
notes: This ability has no damage range and thus always does the same damage.

title: Freeze Earth
description: Freezes the ground in the target area. Enemy movement requires double movement points over frozen ground.

title: Enchant Cold
description: Enchants the target's weapon adding [~20% Spell Power] cold damage to attacks.

title: Chilling Strike
description: The caster's hand becomes imbued with frost thrusting it at the target dealing [~150% Spell Power] cold damage.

title: Frost Shard
description: Impale your target on a shard of ice dealing [~130% Spell Power] cold damage.

title: Frostbite I
description: Your stacks of Chilled now reduce the targets damage by 2%.

title: Crystalize I
description: Increases Physical Resistance by 5%.

title: Frost Borne
description: Increases Cold Resistance by 15%.

title: Deep Freeze
description: Intense frost encircles your foe applying 5 stacks of Chilled on the target.
notes: This effectively freezes the target instantly, since 5 stacks of Chilled will apply Frozen.

title: Frost Armor
description: Envelopes the caster in frost granting 15% Cold Resistance and 10% Physical Resistance. Attackers take [~15% Spell Power] cold damage.

title: Ice Lance
description: The caster hurls a razor-like shard of ice piercing foes in a line dealing [~120% Spell Power] cold damage.

title: Frost Nova
description: The caster creates a wave of frozen energy dealing [~100% Spell Power] cold damage within 2 hexes of the selected target.

title: Frostbite II
description: Your stacks of Chilled now reduce the target's damage by an additional 3%.
notes: This bonus adds to Frostbite I for a total of 5% damage reduction.

title: Crystalize II
description: Increases Physical Resistance by an additional 10%.
notes: This bonus adds to Crystalize I for a total of 15% Physical Resistance.

title: Break the Ice
description: The first time you deal damage in battle it is increased by 100%.

title: Aura of Frost
description: Deals [~40% Spell Power] cold damage to enemies that start their turns within 3 hexes of your character.
notes: Lasts until removed or not enough mana.

title: Breath of Winter
description: Conjures the breath of a frost dragon dealing [~160% Spell Power] cold damage to all enemies in a cone.

title: Ice Wall
description: Summon pillars of ice to block 3 hexes.

title: Frozen Spikes
description: Hurl 5 shards of ice dealing [~20% Spell Power] cold damage to each target.

title: Cold Blooded
description: Each stack of Chilled you've applied increases your cold damage by 5%.

title: Diamond Ice
description: Intelligence increases the effectiveness of Armor and Magic Armor by 0.5% per point.

title: Brain Freeze
description: Deals [100% Spell Power] cold damage each time the target performs an action. Lasts for 3 turns.
notes: This ability does not have a damage range and always does the same damage.

title: Ice Storm
description: Conjure a massive ice storm dealing [90% Spell Power] cold damage to affected enemies each turn.
notes: This ability does not have a damage range and always does the same damage.

title: Stasis
description: Encases the friendly target in ice and restores 30% of their Maximum Health. Increases All Resistances by 50%. Target is stunned for the duration.

title: Frostbite
description: Each stack of Chilled now reduces the target's Maximum Health by 5%.

title: Invulnerable Winter
description: Every stack of your Chilled applied increases your Armor and Magic Armor by 10.

title: Shatter
description: Summons a blast of frozen energy dealing [~70% Spell Power] cold damage plus an additional [~70% Spell Power] per stack of Chilled on targets in a 4 hex radius.

title: Chain Frost
description: Deals [~50% Spell Power] cold damage. Bounces between enemies within 4 hexes up to 10 times.

title: Mass Freeze
description: Applies Frozen to all enemies.

title: Master of Ice
description: Each turn you freeze an enemy, you gain an additional action.

title: Icefall
description: When enemies are frozen by you they release a Frost Nova.

title: Fracture
description: Deals [~70% Attack Power] weapon damage. Lowers target's Physical Resistance by 20% for 2 turns.

title: Rage
description: Increases Damage Dealt and Max Life by 15%. Increases Damage Received by 15%.

title: Double Edge
description: Deal [~180% Attack Power] weapon damage to the target and 15% of the damage back to you.

title: Wanderer
description: Increases Movement Points by 1.

title: Warmonger I
description: Increases the effectiveness of damaging and healing skills by 8%.

title: Guardian I
description: Increases Physical Resistance by 5%.

title: Challenger
description: For every enemy within 1 hex of your character gain 2% to All Resistances.

title: Elemental Fracture
description: Deals [70% Attack Power] weapon damage and lowers target's Elemental Resistances by 25% for 2 turns.

title: Threatening Fracture
description: Deals [70% Attack Power] weapon damage while stealing 10% of the target's Physical Resistance for 2 turns.

title: Tempered Rage
description: Increases Damage Dealt and Max Life by 15%.

title: Beserker's Rage
description: Increases Damage Dealt by 25%. Increases Max Life and Damage Received by 15%.

title: Cleave
description: Swing in a 180 degree arc striking all foes for [~150% Attack Power] weapon damage.

title: Bloodlet
description: Sacrifice 15% of your maximum health in exchange for an additional action this turn.

title: Opportunist
description: Perform an opportunity attack against enemies that move out of melee range.

title: Warmonger II
description: Increases the effectiveness of damaging and healing skills by an additional 12%.
notes: This bonus adds to Warmonger I for a total of 20% increased damage and healing.

title: Guardian II
description: Increases Physical Resistance by an additional 10%.
notes: This bonus adds to Guardian I for a total of 15% Physical Resistance.

title: Into the Fray
description: For every enemy within 3 hexes of your character gain 3% Increased Damage and 3% Maximum Health.

title: Slam
description: Deals [~160% Attack Power] physical damage to all enemies within a line.
notes: Area is 3 hexes wide and 5 hexes long.

title: Warrior's Boon
description: Heals 30% of your maximum health and removes all negative statuses.

title: Howl
description: Deals [~80% Attack Power] physical damage. Enemies within 2 hexes deal 20% less damage for 2 turns.

title: Bleeding Cleave
description: Swing in a 180 degree arc striking all foes for [~150% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies 3 stacks of Bleeding on all targets hit.

title: Life Cleave
description: Swing in a 180 degree arc striking all foes for [~150% Attack Power] weapon damage. Heals you for 20% of the damage dealt.

title: Furious George
description: Might increases the effectiveness of Armor and Magic Armor by 0.5% per point.

title: Shield Mastery
description: Increases Armor and Magic Armor from shields by 100%.

title: Two-Handed Mastery
description: While a two-handed weapon is equipped, all damage is increased by 20%.

title: Dual Wield Mastery
description: While dual wielding Dodge Chance increased by 8%, Critical Hit Chance increased by 8% and Critical Hit Damage increased by 25%.

title: Beserker's Blood
description: For every 1% of health missing, gain 1% increased damage.

title: Stunning Slam
description: Deals [~180% Attack Power] physical damage and applies Stunned to all enemies within a line for 1 turn.
notes: Area is 3 hexes wide and 5 hexes long.

title: Crushing Slam
description: Deals [~240% Attack Power] physical damage to all enemies within a line.
notes: Area is 3 hexes wide and 5 hexes long.

title: Vitality Break
description: Consumes 50% of your current health and deals 200% of that in physical damage to the target.
notes: This is uneffected by damage boosts, and will only scale off of HP consumed.

title: Bone Collector
description: Every enemy that dies grants 6% Maximum Health and Increased Damage. Lasts the duration of the battle. Stacks up to 5 times.

title: Blood Drinker
description: Increases the basic attack damage by 50%. Heal for 20% of damage caused by basic attacks.

title: Executioner
description: Every enemy that dies grants 1 additional AP. Can only grant up to 1 additional AP per turn.

title: Unyielding Contender
description: Become immune to one enemy's damage for 1 turn.

title: Sunder
description: Deals [~200% Attack Power] weapon damage. Ignores all armor and resists. Heal for 50% of damage caused.

title: Colossus
description: Damage you deal splashes to enemies within 1 hex for 50% of the damage dealt.

title: Indestructible
description: Gain a 35% resistance to the last type of damage taken.

title: Healing Hand
description: The caster reaches out in aid, healing 30% of target's Maximum Health.

title: Elemental Protection
description: Increases target's Elemental Resistance by 15%.

title: Regenerate
description: Target restores [~60% Spell Power] health per turn.

title: Cure
description: Restores target's health by [~130% Spell Power].

title: Blessed by Light I
description: Mana costs reduced by 10%.

title: Empowered Light I
description: Increases the effectiveness of all healing given and received by 10%.

title: Seal of Protection
description: Decreases damage taken by 10% for you and allies within 3 hexes.
notes: Lasts until turned off or insufficient mana.

title: Blinding Light
description: Summons a radiant light applying Blind to the target.

title: Shield of Light
description: Calls down a shield that protects the target absorbing [~130% Spell Power] damage.
notes: Shields gain increased power from boosted healing, even though they are not directly healing.

title: Bless
description: Bless all allies within 5 hexes. Increases Damage, Maximum Health and Maximum Mana by 10%.

title: Blessed by Light II
description: Mana costs reduced by an additional 15%.
notes: This bonus adds to Blessed by Light I for a total reduction of 25%.

title: Empowered Light II
description: Increases the effectiveness of all healing given and received by 15%.
notes: This bonus adds to Empowered Light for a total of 25% extra healing.

title: Glory
description: The first time you receive fatal damage in battle you are revived with 1 health and become immune to all damage for 1 turn.

title: Kindred Spirit
description: All healing you do to others also heals you for 20% of the amount healed.

title: Seal of Might
description: Increases the damage of all allies within 3 hexes by 30%.
notes: Lasts until turned off or insufficient mana.

title: Purify
description: Removes all negative statuses from the target.

title: Mass Cure
description: Restores [~180% Spell Power] health to all allies within 2 hexes of the target.

title: Light's Beckon
description: Teleport target ally within 3 hexes of your character.

title: Light's Endurance
description: Increases Vitality by 20%.

title: Light's Strength
description: Increases Might by 20%.

title: Light's Brilliance
description: Increases Intelligence by 20%.

title: Light's Celerity
description: Increases Dexterity by 20%.

title: Shield of Retribution
description: Conjures a shield imbued with holy flame absorbing [~200% Spell Power] damage. Upon shield depletion, it explodes and deals [~200% Spell Power] fire damage to all foes in a 1 hex radius.
notes: Lasts for 3 turns or until depleted. Both the damage and healing values scale off of healing increases and damage increases.

title: Holy Ground
description: Consecrate an area of ground to heal allies that stand upon it. Heals [~75% Spell Power] per turn for 3 turns.

title: Divine Intervention
description: Restores the target to full health.

title: Lingering Light
description: Any target you heal also receives an additional healing over time effect, restoring [40% Spell Power] health each turn for 3 turns.
notes: This does not have a value range, and always heals for the same amount.

title: Quickening
description: Every time one of your Light skills is cast on an ally, one of the ally's spells has it's cooldown lowered by 1 turn. This effect can only happen once per turn.

title: The Good Doctor
description: Reduces the cooldown of all Light spells by 1.

title: Seal of Salvation
description: All allies within 3 hexes of you heal for [100% Spell Power] per turn. Lasts until turned off or insufficient mana.
notes: This ability does not have a value range, and always heals for the same amount.

title: Ascendancy
description: Increases the target ally's stats by 50%.

title: Redemption
description: Redeem the soul of the first character to die in your party. The target's health and mana are fully restored. Does not affect summoned creatures.

title: Salvation
description: Your beneficial Light spells now apply Salvation. Lasts 3 turns.

title: Tracker's Mark
description: Gain 15% Increased Damage and 8% Critical Hit Chance on the target. If the target dies while Tracker's Mark is active, the cooldown is reset.

title: Crippling Shot
description: Deals [~80% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies Crippled.

title: Summon Raven
description: Summons a raven to fight your enemies.

title: Rally
description: Increases movement of all allies within 4 hexes by 2.

title: Eagle Eye
description: Increase the range of all ranged skills by 1 hex.

title: Survivalist I
description: Increases All Resistances and Dodge Chance by 3%.

title: Beast Master I
description: Summons deal 10% more damage and have 10% additional health.

title: Bounty Hunter's Mark
description: Gains 15% Increased Damage and 8% Critical Hit Chance against the target. If the target dies while Bounty Hunter's Mark is active, all cooldowns are reduced by 1.

title: Stalker's Mark
description: Gain 20% Increased Damage and 10% Critical Hit Chance against the target. If the target dies while Stalker's Mark is active, the cooldwon is reset.

title: Bleeding Shot
description: Deals [~80% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies 2 stacks of Bleeding.

title: Pinning Shot
description: Deals [~80% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies Immobilized.

title: Relocate
description: Jump to the target area. Unaffected by increased range modifiers.

title: Precision I
description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 5% and Critical Hit Damage by 15%.

title: Survivalist II
description: Increases All Resistances and Dodge Chance by and additional 5%.
notes: This bonus adds to Survivalist I for a total of of 8%.

title: Beast Master II
description: Summons deal 15% more damage and have 15% additional health.
notes: This bonus adds to Beast Master I for a total of +25% damage and +25% health.

title: Patient Hunter
description: Gives 10% Increased Damage per stack. A stack is applied at the end of each turn. Making any movement removes all stacks. Stacks up to 5 times.

title: Long Shot
description: Deals [~60% Attack Power] weapon damage. For every hex between you and your target, the damage is increased by [~15% Attack Power].

title: Summon Wolf
description: Summons a wolf to fight your enemies.

title: Volley
description: Shoot up to 3 enemies near the target area dealing [~130% Attack Power] weapon damage per target. The arrow can chain to targes within 3 hexes of the last target hit.

title: Precision II
description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by an additional 8% and Critical Hit Damage by an additional 30%.
notes: This bonus adds to Precision I for a total of +13% Chance and +45% Damage

title: Quick Hands
description: Your basic attack has a 33% chance to strike twice.

title: Disengage
description: You can move 1 additional hex each turn and no longer take opportunity attacks.

title: Ranger's Gift I
description: Every hex between you and your target increases damage dealt by 2%.

title: Piercing Shot
description: Deals [~200% Attack Power] weapon damage in a line.

title: Sniper Shot
description: Deals [~60% Attack Power] weapon damage. For every hex between you and your target, damage is increased by [~30% Attack Power].

title: Called Shot
description: Deals [~60% Attack Power] weapon damage. For every hex between you and your target, damage is increased by [~15% Attack Power]. Called shot cannot be dodged or blocked.

title: Quick Draw
description: Your next 3 basic attacks have no AP cost.
notes: Lasts until used.

title: Dispelling Shot
description: Deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. Removes 1 random beneficial status from the target.

title: Take Cover
description: Damage you take from enemies further than 2 hexes away from you is reduced by 35%.

title: Endless Quiver
description: Reduces all Ranger cooldowns by 1.

title: Call of the Wild
description: Summoning skill cooldowns reduced by 1.

title: Ranger's Gift II
description: Every hex between you and your target increases damage dealt by an additional 3%.
notes: This bonus adds to Ranger's Gift I for a total of 5% per hex.

title: Branching Shot
description: Deals [~200% Attack Power] weapon damage. Bounces to enemies within 3 hexes. Each bounch increases its damage by [~50% Attack Power].

title: Impaling Shot
description: Deals [~170% Attack Power] weapon damage in a line. Each enemy it pierces increases its damage by [~170% Attack Power].

title: Animal Companion Grizzly
description: Summons a grizzly bear to fight your enemies.

title: Slaying Shot
description: Deals [400% Attack Power] weapon damage. Ignores all armor and resists. Cannot be dodged.

title: Mythic Reach
description: All ranged abilities have unlimited range.

title: Marked Prey
description: Basic attacks now apply Marked Prey. Marked Prey lasts 1 turn and new stacks refresh the duration of all existing stacks.

title: Raise Skeletal Archer
description: Summon a skeletal archer to fight by your side.

title: Ghost Armor
description: Completely negates the next attack. Lasts until hit.

title: Tainted Touch
description: Reaches out to the target with dark energy dealing [~100% Spell Power] shadow damage and healing for the damage caused.

title: Blind
description: Deals [~70% Spell Power] shadow damage. Applies Blind for 1 turn.

title: Call of the Grave
description: Deal 20% additional damage to enemies below 50% health.

title: Necromancer I
description: Summons deal 10% more damage and have 10% more health.

title: Curse
description: Curses the target lowering All Resistances by 25%.

title: Haunt
description: Deals [~60% Spell Power] shadow damage to the target every turn for 3 turns. Caster heals for 100% of the damage caused.

title: Spectral Chains
description: Applies Immobilized for 1 turn.

title: Trouble Mind
description: Applies 3 stacks of Poisoned to the target

title: Thirst I
description: Heal for 10% of the damage you deal.

title: Dark Pact
description: Increases the effectiveness of your damage and healing skills by 30%. Maximum Health reduced by 20%.

title: Vengeful Shadows
description: Damaging attacks that hit you deal 20% of the damage back to the attacker as shadow damage.

title: Necromancer II
description: Summons deal an additional 15% more damage and have an additional 15% more health.
notes: This bonus adds to Necromaner I for a total of 25% health and damage.

title: Raise Skeletal Warrior
description: Summons a skeletal warrior to fight by your side.

title: Purge Mana
description: Steals [140% Spell Power] of the target's mana.
notes: This ability does not have a damage range, and always steals the same exact amount.

title: Consumption
description: Devour the life force of all enemies within 2 hexes reducing 10% of enemy Maximum Health and giving you 10% Increased Damage for each enemy effected.

title: Soul Fracture
description: Fracture the target's soul, dealing [~110% Spell Power] shadow damage. Lowers the target's Maximum Health and Maximum Mana by 20%.

title: Thirst II
description: Heal for an additional 15% of the damage you deal.
notes: This bonus adds to Thirst I for a total of 25% life steal.

title: Reaper's Toll
description: Every enemy that dies heals you for 10% of your Maximum Health.

title: Hunger
description: Grants 8% Mana Steal, sacrifices 10% maximum health per turn.

title: Vampiric Aura
description: Allies within 3 hexes of you gain 20% life steal.
notes: Lasts until removed or insufficient mana.

title: Dark Ritual
description: Target cannot drop below 1 health while active.

title: Exorcism
description: Removes a random beneficial status from the target. If a status is removed, the target suffers [150% Spell Power] shadow damage.
notes: This ability does not have a damage range, and always deals the same amount of damage.

title: Soul Link
description: All damage and healing dealt to one target is also dealt to the linked target.

title: Leech Intelligence
description: Damage caused steals 0-12 (based on level) points of Intelligence. Lasts the entire battle. Stacks up to 10 times.

title: Leech Might
description: Damage caused steals 0-12 (based on level) points of Might. Lasts the entire battle. Stacks up to 10 times.

title: Leech Dexterity
description: Damage caused steals 0-12 (based on level) points of Dexterity. Lasts the entire battle. Stacks up to 10 times.

title: Raise Skeletal Mage
description: Summon a skeletal mage to fight by your side.

title: Reaper's Scythe
description: Deals [~60% Spell Power] shadow damage for every 10% health missing from the target.

title: Soul Exchange
description: Swaps the life force of both you and a target, exchanging a percentage of current health. The lowest health each target can be swapped to is 30%.

title: Immortal Night
description: Upon dying, you automatically revive to full life but your Maximum Health and Maximum Mana are reduced by 25%. Can trigger up to 3 times in a battle.
notes: Summons stay out while Immortal Night procs.

title: Child of the Abyss
description: Reduces all Damage Received by 50% and Healing Received by 100%.

title: Lich Lord
description: Removes the AP cost from all summoning skills.

title: Dagger Throw
description: Throw a dagger dealing [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage.

title: Cripple
description: Deals [~70% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies Crippled for 1 turn.

title: Escape
description: Teleport to the target area. Unaffected by increased range modifiers.

title: Poison Weapon
description: Attacks now apply 1 stack of Poisoned.

title: Death Dealer I
description: Increase Critical Hit Damage by 20%.

title: Swiftness
description: Increases your Movement Points by 1.

title: Ambush I
description: Deal 20% Increased Damage when an enemy has no allies within 3 hexes.

title: Fencer's Finesse I
description: Increases Dodge Chance by 5%.

title: Poisoned Dagger
description: Throw a poisoned dagger dealing [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies 2 stacks of Poisoned.

title: Deadly Dagger
description: Throw a dagger dealing [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. Deals 50% additional Critical Hit Damage.

title: Maim
description: Deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies Disabled for 1 turn.

title: Gouge
description: Deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. Applies Crippled and Blind for 1 turn.

title: Evasion
description: Gain 100% Dodge Chance against the next attack. Lasts until consumed.

title: Hide In Shadows
description: Grants Stealth for 2 turns.

title: Death Dealer II
description: Increase Critical Hit Damage by an additional 40%.
notes: This bonus adds to Death Dealer I for a total of 60% Critical Hit Damage.

title: Shroud
description: Applies Stealth at the start of each battle.

title: Ambush II
description: Deal and additional 30% increased damage when an enemy has no allies within 3 hexes.
notes: This bonus adds to Ambush I for a total of 50% Increased Damage.

title: Fencer's Finesse II
description: Increases Dodge Chance by an additional 8%.
notes: This bonus adds to Fencer's Finesse I for a total of 13% Dodge Chance.

title: Garrote
description: Applies Disabled to the target for 1 turn and applies 3 stacks of Bleeding.

title: Steal Action
description: Steals the target's action granting 1 additional action this turn. Applies Disabled to the target for 1 turn.

title: Steal Status
description: Steals a random positive status from the target.

title: Uncanny Evasion
description: Gain 100% Dodge Chance for the next attack. Lasts until consumed.

title: Enduring Evasion
description: Gain 100% Dodge Chance against the next 3 attacks. Lasts until consumed. Replaces Evasion

title: Hidden Blade
description: Increases Critical Hit Damage for your basic attack by 75%.

title: En Garde
description: Dodging an attack will cause you to retaliate with a basic attack if the target is within range.

title: Fight Dirty
description: Your attacks apply 2 stacks of Poisoned.

title: Fade
description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain Stealth for 1 turn.

title: Gore
description: Applies Disabled for 1 turn. Deals [~100% Attack Power] weapon damage. An additional 100% Critical Hit Damage is applied on a critical hit.

title: Rupture
description: Applies Disabled for 1 turn and applies 5 stacks of Bleeding.

title: Shadow Walk
description: Teleport to the target hex. Applies Stealth for 1 turn. Unaffected by increased range modifiers.

title: Smoke Bomb
description: Creates a smoke cloud at a target location with a blast radius of 2. Blocks all line of sight into the smoke. Increases Dodge Chance by 50% for all allies in the smoke.

title: Master Assassin
description: Always deal the maximum damage within a damage range.

title: Contaminated Wound
description: Increases the duration of Poisoned and Bleeding effects you've applied by 2 turns.

title: Calculated Risk
description: When you are hit you have a 20% chance to cast Evasion.

title: Sleight of Hand
description: Steal all of the target's benificial statuses while giving the target all your negative statuses.

title: Deathblow
description: Deals [~200% Attack Power] weapon damage. Critical hits deal an additional 200% Critical Hit Damage.

title: Soft Step
description: Moving 3 hexes in a row grants you Stealth for your current turn. Your character also no longer takes attacks of opportunity.
notes: This stealth fades as you end your turn.

title: Tricks of the Trade
description: Reduces the cooldown of all abilities by 1.
notes: This can not reduce a cooldown below 1 turn.
